channel.title: Rock & Mineral of the Day
channel.description: Daily geology education featuring a different rock and mineral each day from Wikipedia

item.title: Pumice & Halite - February 08, 2026
item.description:
ðŸª¨ Today's Rock: Pumice

A vesicular volcanic rock so full of gas bubbles that it can float on water.

Learn more about Pumice on Wikipedia

ðŸ’Ž Today's Mineral: Halite

Rock salt. Forms from evaporation of seawater. Essential for human life and historically valuable for trade.

Learn more about Halite on Wikipedia

Visit the Rock & Mineral of the Day page for images and full Wikipedia articles.
